description: When a chance to join a medical start-up in Boston presented itself, I pressed pause on my studies, packed my bags and hopped on a plane. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: A gap year could be a ticket to life-changing experiences
title_page: A gap year could be a ticket to life-changing experiences | The Straits Times
maintext:

I was passionate about entrepreneurship and medical innovation, and when a serendipitous chance to join a medical start-up in Boston came along, I took a leap of faith.
